Texts.Chs: 你是打算去吃那些洋芋吗？尝尝你自己的皮肤怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Are you gonna eat that hashbrown? How about your own skin instead?

Texts.Chs: 你真的打算....好吧你做到了。伙计，这可真是^red;滑稽^reset;。我只是叫你漫游宇宙，看看你会不会在哪一天死去，但你却在没有任何防护的情况下降落到了一颗气态巨行星上。多么不可思议啊。我会^red;立刻^reset;向其他人转告你的死讯的，祝你死得愉快！
Texts.Eng: Did you really just....yea you did. That is ^red;hilarious^reset;, dude. I just called you across the cosmos to see if you died, and you are on a gas giant without protection. Amazing. Totally telling the guys ^green;right now^reset;. Die well!

Texts.Chs: 天呐，我简直爱死你这发疯的模样了！你永远都不会知道，究竟是我在说话，还是你的大脑已经到了精神崩溃的地步！
Texts.Eng: God I love it when you're insane! You can never tell if its me talking or your own mind reaching a psychotic breaking point!.

Texts.Chs: 我的天呐，你算是我曾见过的样貌最为古怪的人之一了。你他妈到底是什么鬼？
Texts.Eng: Holy crap. You are one of the weirdest looking things I have ^orange;ever^reset; seen. What the heck are you?

Texts.Chs: 我不确定你有没有意识到，但是问题似乎就这么来了：你现在还活着。请你尽快纠正这个问题——难道你不想要更多的肉吗？
Texts.Eng: I'm unsure if you are aware, but there appears to be a problem. You are still currently alive. Please correct the issue soon or you won't get more meat.

Texts.Chs: 我的奴才，谢谢你。再来一项^green;完全没有意义，又惹人厌^reset;的任务如何？听起来不错吧？我就不再啰嗦了，不管怎么样，去做吧，笨蛋。
Texts.Eng: Thanks, minion. How about another ^green;completely pointless, annoying^reset; fetch task? Sound good? Tough crap. Do it anyway. Loser.

Texts.Chs: 喔喔，我可不是那个叫凯文的家伙，我只是你在精神错乱时听到的些许迷音罢了。另外，你应该朝自己开一枪。去做吧。
Texts.Eng: Woooooooo, I'm totally not Kevin and just the voices of insanity telling you to shoot yourself in the appendix. Do it.

Texts.Chs: 耶，我要装出一副热情的样子，好让你继续为我工作，同时又派你去执行^green;另一项^reset;更令人恼火的任务。
Texts.Eng: Yay. I shall feign enthusiasm in order to keep you working for me while dispatching you on ^green;yet another^reset; aggravating quest of complete annoyance.
